name: Repulser: Invasion of the Aspect
description:
Repulser is a 90's-esque shmup.  Fast , energetic action with a pumpin' soundtrack to compliment the excitement.

  • Aid the galaxy's defenders against the un-relenting Aspect. 
  • Utilise your beam super weapon, multiple ships and experimental weapons to turn the tide of battle.
  • Wreak destruction through 10 levels across 2 chapters to liberate a captive planet.
  • Mix and match weapon loadouts to find the most effective means of extniguishing your enemies.

Play with keyboard or gamepad.  Xbox Controller supported and generic USB controllers with 4 buttons.

Minimum System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7/8/10, Linux (Ubuntu 18.04)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB Ram
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or DirectX 9
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
